The file system example can be run online by clicking on the links below. The server examples need to be downloaded and run manually.

JSCover Server

Run example-server.sh (see below) and then go to http://localhost:8080/jscoverage.html?/index.html.

java -jar target/dist/JSCover.jar -ws --branch --document-root=doc/example --report-dir=target

Manually run the command below the go to: http://localhost:8080/jscoverage.html?/test/index.html.

java -jar target/dist/JSCover.jar -ws --branch --document-root=doc/example-qunit/src --report-dir=target

Now try again with the '--no-instrument=/test' option to remove the test scripts from the report.

java -jar target/dist/JSCover.jar -ws --branch --document-root=doc/example-qunit/src --report-dir=target --no-instrument=/test

JSCover File Instrumentation

Run example-filesystem.sh (see below) and then go to QUnit test suite.

java -jar target/dist/JSCover.jar -fs --branch --no-instrument=test doc/example-qunit/src doc/example-qunit/out
